Articles.Content: I am having issues with roll control, for some reason, when I press the button to roll left (counterclockwise) it rolls to the right! (clockwise) but if I press the button to roll right, it still rolls right. In other words, I can’t roll left no matter what I do. I know the issue isn’t with my controller, as all other functions in the game with that button (LB/L2) work fine, so something is wrong with KSP. Loading a quicksave does nothing to resolve this. Is there a fix for this? It is very frustrating how many unresolved bugs are left on the console version.

Welcome to the forum and sorry to hear about your issue. I'm not sure this is a bug, it may be that you have trim engaged so please check the controls for your system and see if there is a 'cancel trim' option.
